name: Struggle (POLIMI Game Collective)
description:
“Struggle” is a 3D Platform that addresses the issue of managing depression through a metaphorical, twisted journey. 

Because you questioned life and the beauty it posses, you end up in the bottom of a dark and creepy pit and get to know a little, scared, creature that, like you, had seen only the worst in the world...before entering that place that looks like hell, ruled by evil shadows that eat the weakest souls consumed by depression.

The little creature asks your help to escape from the pit and that evil creatures. 
Together you will face perils and dangers that can cost you life. Remember, when in trouble, always follow the lights. 

There are no safe zones in “Struggle”, once you kill the little creature with your decisions you are forced to start all over again, and help another creature in order to escape from the pit. 

It will be a hard journey, and only the ones that really want to escape will succeed. 

Video game developed for the Videogame Design and Programming course, Dipartimento di Elettronica, Informazione e Bioingegneria, Politecnico di Milano
